text: VV Almkerk is an association football club from Almkerk, Netherlands. It was founded on 4 October 1945. Its home ground is Sportpark Almkerk. The first male squad of VV Almkerk plays in Eerste Klasse Saturday South since 2018. Coach is Ad van Seeters, who replaced Robert Roest in the summer of 2019.https://regio-voetbal.nl/nieuws/ad-van-seeters-nieuwe-trainer- almkerkhttps://www.bd.nl/amateurvoetbal/ad-van-seeters-bij-almkerk-opvolger- van-robert-roest~ac2348a2/ ==References== == External links == * Official website Category:Football clubs in the Netherlands Category:Football clubs in North Brabant Category:Football clubs in Altena, North Brabant Category:Land van Heusden en Altena Category:Woudrichem Category:Association football clubs established in 1945 Category:1945 establishments in the Netherlands
title: VV Almkerk
